sentences.english: I believe as time moves on, the legacy of Zhu Rongji will become more obvious.
sentences.chinese: 相信随着时局推移，朱熔基的价值和意义会更加凸显。

sentences.english: Zhu Rongji was a great man who was situated before his time.
sentences.chinese: 朱熔基是超出于时代的伟人。

sentences.english: President Jiang Zemin and Premier Zhu Rongji met with the U. S. delegation.
sentences.chinese: 江泽明总统和朱熔基第一的遇到美国代表团。
